name: smoltron: defender of the smoliverse
description: From days of smol ago, from uncharted regions of the smoliverse, comes a legend. The legend of smoltron: Defender of the smoliverse. A mighty smol robot, loved by smol, feared by evil. As smoltron's legend grew, smol settled across the galaxy. 10 x 10 pixels. In honor of the smol movement and Voltron.
